resources.string: "Netology. University of Internet Professions of the Future"

"Hi, this is the new Netology! Netology once started with intensive courses in online marketing. Then courses appeared in design, development, analytics and management. We grow ourselves and help students grow: from beginners to confident professionals. But the most important thing remains with us: we believe that everyone already has a force that makes them want more, aim higher, run faster. Our mission is to help get on the path to growth and start a chain of changes â†’ http://netolo.gy/fyb"
